options.content:
Data Management and Movement
IDUN Home
OSC Product Role Matrix
Microservice Repositories and Pipelines
Domain: $dmm_domain
App: $dmm_app
Pods: ${dmm_podlist}
Databases: ${dmm_datname}
Topics: ${dmm_mytopics}

panels.description: This is the sum of container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total / container_cpu_cfs_periods_total
panels.title: Average Container CPU Throttling Percentage

panels.description:
This is the container_cpu_usage_seconds_total rate per container for pods $dmm_podlist.

This translates to cpu millisecond used per 1000milliseconds. 1 ms/second = 1 millicore
panels.title: Container CPU Core Usage

panels.description: This is the container_memory_working_set_bytes usage per container for pods $dmm_podlist.
panels.title: Container Memory Usage

panels.description:
This is the container_cpu_cfs_throttled_seconds_total  per container for pods $dmm_podlist. 

This represents the amount of millisceconds per 1000 milliseconds that a container has been throttled
panels.title: Container CPU Throttling

panels.description: This is the container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total / container_cpu_cfs_periods_total for pods $dmm_podlist.
panels.title: Container CPU Throttling Percentage
work in progress - % CPU of container_spec_cpu_quota
work in progress - % memory of container_spec_cpu_quota

panels.description:
Indicates whether the broker is active and should always be equals to 1 since there is only one broker at the same time that acts as
controller.
panels.title: Active controller

panels.description: Indicates the number of brokers online (currently set to 3)
panels.title: Brokers Online

panels.description: Indicates if the brokers are unresponsive. If broker goes down, it gives the count
panels.title: Offline Partitions Count

panels.description: Indicates if the brokers are unresponsive. If broker goes down, it gives the count
panels.title: Under Replicated Partitions

panels.description:
Information for number of rApps creating a subscription.
An rApp sends the request by sending IDS artifact which may contain multiple subscriptions
panels.title: Characteristics_subscribe_Metrics_seconds_count

panels.description: Information for number of rApps making unsubscribe requests
panels.title: Request per unsubscribe endpoint

panels.description: Information for number of rApps updating specific subscription predicate values.
panels.title: Request per update predicate endpoint
Number of schemas registered per second
Number of schemas retrieved per second
